mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(merchant_dept_id) ,merchant_dept_name from merchant where id in ( SELECT merchant_id from trade_order where create_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),INTERVAL 0 HOUR) and DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),INTERVAL 24 HOUR) and status = 1 GROUP BY merchant_id )

SELECT a.id, a.merchant_id AS merchantId, a.merchant_name AS merchantName, a.pay_type AS payType, a.order_id AS orderId, a.trade_no AS tradeNo, a.sys_trade_no AS sysTradeNo, a.order_amount AS orderAmount, a.pay_time AS payTime, a.notify_status AS notifyStatus FROM trade_order a WHERE a.merchant_dept_id = #{deptId} AND a. STATUS = 1 AND a.create_time between DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),INTERVAL 0 HOUR) AND DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),INTERVAL 24 HOUR),INTERVAL 1 SECOND)
